name: Multi-Platform Social Media Publisher with Airtable, Google Drive, and Postiz

user.name: Kurt Bijl
user.bio: I believe AI is a force multiplier ‚Äî but only if you know how to use it. I create high-quality, easy-to-follow content for people like me: driven, curious, and ready to build.

description:
## üìù POSTIZ MEDIA UPLOAD WORKFLOW
‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ

üéØ PURPOSE:
Automated media upload pipeline that downloads videos and images from Google Drive and uploads them to Postiz storage for social media posting.

üîÑ WORKFLOW PROCESS:
1. Webhook triggers the workflow
2. Fetch media metadata from Airtable
3. Download video + image from Google Drive
4. Upload both files to Postiz storage
5. Save Postiz file paths back to Airtable

üîß TECHNICAL DETAILS:
‚Ä¢ API: Postiz /upload endpoint (multipart-form-data)
‚Ä¢ Storage: Converts Google Drive files ‚Üí Postiz URLs
‚Ä¢ Integration: Updates Airtable with Postiz paths
‚Ä¢ Required: All media must be uploaded before posting

## üì± SOCIAL MEDIA POSTING WORKFLOW
‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ

üéØ PURPOSE:
Automated multi-platform social media posting using Postiz API. Distributes content across Instagram, Twitter/X (2 accounts), LinkedIn, and Facebook with platform-specific content cleaning and formatting.

üîÑ COMPLETE WORKFLOW PROCESS:
1. üìä Fetch social media content from Airtable database
2. üîó Get integration IDs for all connected social platforms
3. üîÄ Route each platform to appropriate content processor
4. üßπ Clean content to prevent JSON formatting errors
5. üì± Post to respective social media platforms simultaneously

üìã PLATFORM COVERAGE:
‚Ä¢ üì∏ Instagram (Visual content + captions)
‚Ä¢ üê¶ Twitter/X Main Account (Text + images)
‚Ä¢ üê¶ Twitter/X Alt Account (Duplicate posting)
‚Ä¢ üíº LinkedIn (Professional content)
‚Ä¢ üìò Facebook (Meta ecosystem posting)

‚ö†Ô∏è CRITICAL CONTENT CLEANING:
‚Ä¢ Removes line breaks (\n), carriage returns (\r), tabs (\t)
‚Ä¢ Replaces multiple spaces with single spaces
‚Ä¢ Prevents 'JSON parameter needs to be valid JSON' errors
‚Ä¢ ESSENTIAL: Without cleaning, all API calls fail!

üîß TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS:
‚Ä¢ API: Postiz /posts endpoint (POST)
‚Ä¢ Authentication: HTTP Header Auth
‚Ä¢ Content-Type: application/json
‚Ä¢ Posting Type: Immediate ('now') + 1 minute delay
‚Ä¢ Media: References pre-uploaded Postiz image paths
‚Ä¢ Rate Limit: 30 requests/hour (API beta limitation)

üîó DATA SOURCES:
‚Ä¢ Content: Airtable 
‚Ä¢ Media: Pre-uploaded via separate media upload workflow
‚Ä¢ Fields: instagram_caption, linkedin_post, twitter single, faceboook
‚Ä¢ Images: References 'postiz image' field paths

‚ö° EXECUTION FLOW:
Airtable ‚Üí Integrations ‚Üí Platform Router ‚Üí Content Cleaners ‚Üí Social Publishers

üö® TROUBLESHOOTING:
‚Ä¢ JSON Errors: Check content cleaning nodes
‚Ä¢ 500 Errors: Verify integration IDs and account connections
‚Ä¢ Missing Media: Ensure media upload workflow ran first
‚Ä¢ Rate Limits: Space out executions (30/hour limit)

üîÑ DEPENDENCIES:
‚Ä¢ Requires: Media upload workflow (for image/video paths)
‚Ä¢ Connects to: Analytics and monitoring workflows
‚Ä¢ Updates: Airtable with posting status and URLs

‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ






‚ö†Ô∏è CRITICAL NOTES:
‚Ä¢ Cannot use external URLs in Postiz posts
‚Ä¢ Files must be uploaded to google drive first - id referenced in airtable
‚Ä¢ Enables reference tracking for all platforms

üìä DATA FLOW:
Google Drive ‚Üí Download ‚Üí Postiz Upload ‚Üí Airtable Update

üîó CONNECTS TO:
Main social media posting workflows that reference these uploaded file paths for Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook, and YouTube posting.
## üé¨ VIDEO POSTING WORKFLOW
‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ

üéØ PURPOSE:
Automated video content distribution across Instagram, Facebook, and YouTube using Postiz API. Specialized workflow for video content with platform-specific processing and cleaning.

üîÑ WORKFLOW EXECUTION:
1. üìä Fetch video content from Airtable database (recuoYjg4icStHsMK)
2. üîó Get integration IDs for video-enabled platforms
3. üîÄ Route platforms to appropriate video processors
4. üßπ Clean content for Instagram & Facebook (YouTube bypassed)
5. üìπ Publish to video platforms simultaneously

üìπ PLATFORM COVERAGE:
‚Ä¢ üì± Instagram: Video posts & Reels (‚úÖ Working)
‚Ä¢ üìò Facebook: Video content (‚ö†Ô∏è Test mode)
‚Ä¢ üé¨ YouTube: Long-form videos (üö® Broken)

‚ö° EXECUTION FLOW:
Airtable ‚Üí Integrations ‚Üí Video Router ‚Üí [3 Parallel Paths]
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Instagram: Cleaner ‚Üí Publisher
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Facebook: Cleaner ‚Üí Publisher  
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ YouTube: [Direct] ‚Üí Publisher

üóÑÔ∏è DATA SOURCE:
‚Ä¢ Base: Netkreatives.com 
‚Ä¢ Table: Youtube tool 
‚Ä¢ Video Field: 'postiz video'
‚Ä¢ Content Fields: instagram_caption, faceboook


üîß TECHNICAL SPECS:
‚Ä¢ Method: POST
‚Ä¢ Auth: HTTP Header (Postiz credentials)
‚Ä¢ Timing: Immediate posting (+1 minute delay)
‚Ä¢ Media: Pre-uploaded video paths
‚Ä¢ Content-Type: application/json

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

nodes.name: üìä Content Database (Media)
nodes.notes:
üìã Fetches media and content from Airtable
‚Ä¢ Table: Youtube tool (tblRnaXqxrvcQhqBw)
‚Ä¢ Record: recuoYjg4icStHsMK
‚Ä¢ Contains: Video/image file IDs, social content
‚Ä¢ Fields: Short form Video, Image for socials
üîó Feeds into media download and upload pipeline

nodes.name: üìπ Video Upload to Postiz
nodes.notes:
üîÑ Uploads video files to Postiz storage
‚Ä¢ Endpoint: POST /upload
‚Ä¢ Content-Type: multipart-form-data
‚Ä¢ Input: Binary video data from Google Drive
‚Ä¢ Output: Postiz file ID and path
‚Ä¢ Required: Videos must be uploaded before posting
‚ö†Ô∏è Cannot use external URLs in Postiz posts

nodes.name: üíæ Save Video Path
nodes.notes:
üîÑ Updates Airtable with Postiz video path
‚Ä¢ Operation: Update record
‚Ä¢ Field: 'postiz video' = upload response path
‚Ä¢ Maintains data consistency across systems
‚Ä¢ Enables future reference to uploaded videos
üìù Links Google Drive ‚Üí Postiz ‚Üí Airtable chain

nodes.name: üñºÔ∏è Image Upload to Postiz
nodes.notes:
üîÑ Uploads image files to Postiz storage
‚Ä¢ Endpoint: POST /upload
‚Ä¢ Content-Type: multipart-form-data
‚Ä¢ Input: Binary image data from Google Drive
‚Ä¢ Output: Postiz file ID and path for posts
‚Ä¢ Supports: JPG, PNG, GIF formats
üì± Used across Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook

nodes.name: üíæ Save Image Path
nodes.notes:
üîÑ Updates Airtable with Postiz image path
‚Ä¢ Operation: Update record
‚Ä¢ Field: 'postiz image' = upload response path
‚Ä¢ Used by all image-based social posts
‚Ä¢ Maintains referential integrity
üìä Enables tracking of media usage across platforms

nodes.name: üì• Download Video from Drive
nodes.notes:
‚òÅÔ∏è Downloads video from Google Drive
‚Ä¢ Input: Google Drive file ID from Airtable
‚Ä¢ Field: 'Short form Video'
‚Ä¢ Output: Binary video data
‚Ä¢ Formats: MP4, MOV, AVI supported
üîó Feeds directly into Postiz upload pipeline

nodes.name: üì• Download Image from Drive
nodes.notes:
‚òÅÔ∏è Downloads image from Google Drive
‚Ä¢ Input: Google Drive file ID from Airtable
‚Ä¢ Field: 'Image for socials'
‚Ä¢ Output: Binary image data
‚Ä¢ Used across all visual social platforms
üì± Optimized for social media dimensions

parameters.content:
## üìù POSTIZ MEDIA UPLOAD WORKFLOW
‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ

üéØ PURPOSE:
Automated media upload pipeline that downloads videos and images from Google Drive and uploads them to Postiz storage for social media posting.

üîÑ WORKFLOW PROCESS:
1. Webhook triggers the workflow
2. Fetch media metadata from Airtable
3. Download video + image from Google Drive
4. Upload both files to Postiz storage
5. Save Postiz file paths back to Airtable

üîß TECHNICAL DETAILS:
‚Ä¢ API: Postiz /upload endpoint (multipart-form-data)
‚Ä¢ Storage: Converts Google Drive files ‚Üí Postiz URLs
‚Ä¢ Integration: Updates Airtable with Postiz paths
‚Ä¢ Required: All media must be uploaded before posting








‚ö†Ô∏è CRITICAL NOTES:
‚Ä¢ Cannot use external URLs in Postiz posts
‚Ä¢ Files must be uploaded to google drive first - id referenced in airtable
‚Ä¢ Enables reference tracking for all platforms

üìä DATA FLOW:
Google Drive ‚Üí Download ‚Üí Postiz Upload ‚Üí Airtable Update

üîó CONNECTS TO:
Main social media posting workflows that reference these uploaded file paths for Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook, and YouTube posting.

‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ

nodes.name: üîó integrations
nodes.notes:
üìã Fetches all connected social media integrations from Postiz
‚Ä¢ Gets integration IDs for Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc.
‚Ä¢ Required for platform-specific posting
‚Ä¢ Returns: id, name, identifier, disabled status

nodes.name: üîÄ Platform Router
nodes.notes:
üéØ Routes integrations to appropriate posting workflows
‚Ä¢ Instagram: cmcotolny0001pnal2i86mkrh
‚Ä¢ Twitter Alt: cmcg6ifpn001hmx9gakul0358
‚Ä¢ Twitter Main: cmcf026ts0001mx9g6o8t5xc4
‚Ä¢ LinkedIn: linkedin-page identifier
‚Ä¢ Facebook: facebook identifier
‚Ä¢ YouTube: youtube identifier
‚ö†Ô∏è Integration IDs are unique per Postiz installation

nodes.name: üê¶ X/Twitter Posts
nodes.notes:
üì± Posts to Twitter/X using Postiz API
‚Ä¢ Uses cleaned 'twitter single' content from Airtable
‚Ä¢ Includes image from 'postiz image' field
‚Ä¢ Posts immediately (type: 'now')
‚Ä¢ Settings: type='post' for regular tweets
üí° Content must be cleaned to prevent JSON errors

nodes.name: üíº LinkedIn Publisher
nodes.notes:
üìä Posts professional content to LinkedIn
‚Ä¢ Uses cleaned 'linkedin_post' content (processed by Code2)
‚Ä¢ Targets LinkedIn Pages (business accounts)
‚Ä¢ Professional formatting and tone
‚Ä¢ Image support for visual content
‚úÖ Content cleaning prevents JSON formatting errors

nodes.name: üê¶ X/Twitter Alt Account
nodes.notes:
üì± Alternative Twitter/X account posting
‚Ä¢ Duplicate of main Twitter posting for secondary account
‚Ä¢ Uses same 'twitter single' content
‚Ä¢ Different integration ID for alt account
‚Ä¢ Maintains consistency across multiple X accounts
üîÑ Part of multi-account social strategy

nodes.name: üßπ Instagram Content Cleaner
nodes.notes:
‚ö†Ô∏è CRITICAL: Fixes JSON formatting issues
‚Ä¢ Removes line breaks (\n), carriage returns (\r), tabs (\t)
‚Ä¢ Replaces multiple spaces with single spaces
‚Ä¢ Prevents 'JSON parameter needs to be valid JSON' errors
‚Ä¢ Essential for Instagram caption processing
üö´ Without this: API calls fail with malformed JSON

nodes.name: üì∏ Instagram Publisher
nodes.notes:
üì± Posts visual content to Instagram
‚Ä¢ Uses cleaned 'instagram_caption' (processed by Code1)
‚Ä¢ Requires image for all Instagram posts
‚Ä¢ Tags: 'instagram' for tracking
‚Ä¢ Settings: type='post' for feed posts
‚úÖ Working configuration with proper content cleaning

nodes.name: üìä Content Database (Posts)
nodes.notes:
üìã Fetches social media content from Airtable
‚Ä¢ Same table/record as media source
‚Ä¢ Contains: platform-specific post content
‚Ä¢ Fields: instagram_caption, linkedin_post, twitter single, faceboook
‚Ä¢ Feeds content into cleaning and posting workflows
üîÑ Central content repository for all platforms

nodes.name: üßπ LinkedIn Content Cleaner
nodes.notes:
‚ö†Ô∏è CRITICAL: Fixes JSON formatting for LinkedIn
‚Ä¢ Same cleaning logic as Instagram cleaner
‚Ä¢ Removes problematic characters: \n, \r, \t
‚Ä¢ Prevents API failures with malformed JSON
‚Ä¢ Essential for LinkedIn professional content
üíº Maintains professional formatting while ensuring JSON validity

nodes.name: üìò Facebook Publisher
nodes.notes:
üì± Posts content to Facebook
‚Ä¢ Uses cleaned 'faceboook' content (processed by Code3)
‚Ä¢ Supports both images and videos
‚Ä¢ Similar functionality to Instagram
‚Ä¢ Settings: type='post' for feed posts
üîµ Part of Meta ecosystem alongside Instagram

nodes.name: üßπ Facebook Content Cleaner
nodes.notes:
‚ö†Ô∏è CRITICAL: Fixes JSON formatting for Facebook
‚Ä¢ Cleans 'faceboook' field from Airtable
‚Ä¢ Same regex patterns as other cleaners
‚Ä¢ Prevents JSON parsing errors in API calls
‚Ä¢ Essential for Facebook posting reliability
üìò Part of Meta content processing pipeline

parameters.content:
## üì± SOCIAL MEDIA POSTING WORKFLOW
‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ

üéØ PURPOSE:
Automated multi-platform social media posting using Postiz API. Distributes content across Instagram, Twitter/X (2 accounts), LinkedIn, and Facebook with platform-specific content cleaning and formatting.

üîÑ COMPLETE WORKFLOW PROCESS:
1. üìä Fetch social media content from Airtable database
2. üîó Get integration IDs for all connected social platforms
3. üîÄ Route each platform to appropriate content processor
4. üßπ Clean content to prevent JSON formatting errors
5. üì± Post to respective social media platforms simultaneously

üìã PLATFORM COVERAGE:
‚Ä¢ üì∏ Instagram (Visual content + captions)
‚Ä¢ üê¶ Twitter/X Main Account (Text + images)
‚Ä¢ üê¶ Twitter/X Alt Account (Duplicate posting)
‚Ä¢ üíº LinkedIn (Professional content)
‚Ä¢ üìò Facebook (Meta ecosystem posting)

‚ö†Ô∏è CRITICAL CONTENT CLEANING:
‚Ä¢ Removes line breaks (\n), carriage returns (\r), tabs (\t)
‚Ä¢ Replaces multiple spaces with single spaces
‚Ä¢ Prevents 'JSON parameter needs to be valid JSON' errors
‚Ä¢ ESSENTIAL: Without cleaning, all API calls fail!

üîß TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS:
‚Ä¢ API: Postiz /posts endpoint (POST)
‚Ä¢ Authentication: HTTP Header Auth
‚Ä¢ Content-Type: application/json
‚Ä¢ Posting Type: Immediate ('now') + 1 minute delay
‚Ä¢ Media: References pre-uploaded Postiz image paths
‚Ä¢ Rate Limit: 30 requests/hour (API beta limitation)

üîó DATA SOURCES:
‚Ä¢ Content: Airtable 
‚Ä¢ Media: Pre-uploaded via separate media upload workflow
‚Ä¢ Fields: instagram_caption, linkedin_post, twitter single, faceboook
‚Ä¢ Images: References 'postiz image' field paths

parameters.content:
## üé¨ VIDEO POSTING WORKFLOW
‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ

üéØ PURPOSE:
Automated video content distribution across Instagram, Facebook, and YouTube using Postiz API. Specialized workflow for video content with platform-specific processing and cleaning.

üîÑ WORKFLOW EXECUTION:
1. üìä Fetch video content from Airtable database (recuoYjg4icStHsMK)
2. üîó Get integration IDs for video-enabled platforms
3. üîÄ Route platforms to appropriate video processors
4. üßπ Clean content for Instagram & Facebook (YouTube bypassed)
5. üìπ Publish to video platforms simultaneously

üìπ PLATFORM COVERAGE:
‚Ä¢ üì± Instagram: Video posts & Reels (‚úÖ Working)
‚Ä¢ üìò Facebook: Video content (‚ö†Ô∏è Test mode)
‚Ä¢ üé¨ YouTube: Long-form videos (üö® Broken)

‚ö° EXECUTION FLOW:
Airtable ‚Üí Integrations ‚Üí Video Router ‚Üí [3 Parallel Paths]
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Instagram: Cleaner ‚Üí Publisher
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Facebook: Cleaner ‚Üí Publisher  
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ YouTube: [Direct] ‚Üí Publisher

üóÑÔ∏è DATA SOURCE:
‚Ä¢ Base: Netkreatives.com 
‚Ä¢ Table: Youtube tool 
‚Ä¢ Video Field: 'postiz video'
‚Ä¢ Content Fields: instagram_caption, faceboook


üîß TECHNICAL SPECS:
‚Ä¢ Method: POST
‚Ä¢ Auth: HTTP Header (Postiz credentials)
‚Ä¢ Timing: Immediate posting (+1 minute delay)
‚Ä¢ Media: Pre-uploaded video paths
‚Ä¢ Content-Type: application/json
